resources.string: You found a powerful TM. What do you do?
Use it to teach the technique to your best pokemon, no matter what.
Sell it or discard it. You don\'t want to force it.
Your main Pokemon is Pikachu and you found a Thunder stone. What do you do?
A wild Charizard (Lv 60) appears. What do you do?
You pick your best Pokemon Team and Battle him on your own.
Let it go. You prefer to catch a charmander and evolve it yourself.
How did you answer the last question?
You have to evolve an Eevee. Which rock will you use?
Beach, relax, sun and the ocean.
The woods. nature and peace of mind.
You are locked in a room with 3 exits. Which of the following would you use to escape?
Door 2 takes you to a bridge where you must fight the guards to scape.
Last but not least. Which legendary bird do you prefer?
